name: Communication To Mega.nz
description: Detects an executable accessing mega.co.nz, which could be a sign of forbidden file sharing use of data exfiltration by malicious actors
false_positives: Legitimate use of mega.nz uploaders and tools
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(network.direction:true AND destination.domain:*api.mega.co.nz)`
